Class ProgramExplorationEnrollmentControls

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.ClientControllers.ProgramExplorationEnrollmentControls
public class ProgramExplorationEnrollmentControls extends Object
This class helps clients explore and enroll in fitness programs
Author:
Alaa Alawneh

    Method
    Description
    static String
    enrollInProgram()
    This method lets the client enroll in a fitness program The user can choose a program from a list of available programs

  • Method Details

    • filterProgramsByDifficulty

      public static String filterProgramsByDifficulty(String difficulty)
      This method filters fitness programs by difficulty level It shows all the programs that match the given difficulty
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty level to filter by
      Returns:
      A message saying programs were filtered by difficulty

    • filterProgramsByFocusArea

      public static String filterProgramsByFocusArea(String focusArea)
      This method filters fitness programs by their focus area It shows all the programs that match the given focus area
      Parameters:
      focusArea - The focus area to filter by
      Returns:
      A message saying programs were filtered by focus area

    • enrollInProgram

      public static String enrollInProgram()
      This method lets the client enroll in a fitness program The user can choose a program from a list of available programs
      Returns:
      A message saying the enrollment was successful or null if unsuccessful

    • viewProgramSchedule

      public static String viewProgramSchedule(String programName)
      This method shows the schedule of a specific program
      Parameters:
      programName - The name of the program whose schedule you want to see
      Returns:
      A message saying the schedule was displayed or an error message if the program was not found
